articles.description: Football latest: Reaction to Real Madrid 2-1 Bayern Munich as Joselu double gives Real dramatic late comeback win in Champions League semi-final second leg.
articles.title: Reaction: Real Madrid 2-1 Bayern Munich - Real reach Champions League final with dramatic comeback

articles.description: It is sport's most decisive and divisive moment - but what is it like to deliver a knockout punch, and to take one?
articles.title: Knockout: Ricky Hatton, David Haye, Tony Bellew and more talk KOs

articles.description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland could be named Premier League player of the season for a second consecutive year.
articles.title: Premier League player of season: Erling Haaland & Phil Foden on shortlist

articles.description: When Harry Kane was on the pitch, Bayern Munich were heading to the Champions League final at Wembley. When he wasn't there, it all went wrong.
articles.title: Harry Kane: Thomas Tuchel blames striker's back pain for Bayern Munich substitution

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen could reach a first European final in over a two decades on Thursday night as they look to keep alive hopes of an Invincible Treble.
articles.title: Bayer Leverkusen: Will Xabi Alonso's side win an Invincible Treble?

articles.description: On-loan striker Melvine Malard wants to become "a part of Manchester United history" by winning the Women's FA Cup on Sunday.
articles.title: Women's FA Cup final: Melvine Malard eyes 'Manchester United history'

articles.description: Naomi Osaka beats France's Clara Burel in straight sets in the Italian Open first round on her first appearance at the tournament since 2021.
articles.title: Naomi Osaka marks Italian Open return with victory

articles.description: Denver Nuggets centre Nikola Jokic joins some of the NBA's all-time greats by winning the league's Most Valuable Player award for the third time.
articles.title: NBA MVP: Nikola Jokic wins third Most Valuable Player award

articles.description: The 2023 Wimbledon girls' singles runner-up Nikola Bartunkova is provisionally suspended for doping after two positive tests.
articles.title: Nikola Bartunkova: Wimbledon girls runner-up provisionally suspended

articles.description: Former Spanish FA chief, Luis Rubiales is to stand trial for charges of sexual assault and coercion over the unsolicited kiss he gave player, Jenni Hermoso during last year's World Cup win.
articles.title: Luis Rubiales to face trial for sexual assault after World Cup kiss
